content: तक्ष् {c1c} {c5c} <ab>P.</ab> (तक्षति, तक्ष्णोति, तष्ट) {@--1@} To chop, cut off, pare, chisel, slice, split; आत्मानं तक्षति ह्येष वनं परशुना यथा <ls>Mb.</ls>; निधाय तक्ष्यते यत्र काष्ठे काष्ठं स उद्घनः <ls>Ak.</ls> {@--2@} To fashion, shape, form (out of wood &c.). {@--3@} To make, create in general. {@--4@} To wound, hurt. {@--5@} To invent, form in the mind. {@--6@} To make one's own, appropriate. {@--7@} To cover. {@--8@} To peel. {@--9@} To make thin. --WITH निस् {@--1@} to slice out of. {@--2@} to form, create.
तक्ष् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (At the end of <ab>comp.</ab>) Paring, cutting &c.; also तक्ष.
